_header: Mankind was shent and ay forlore
_description: A song of the Nativity, by James Ryman — six quatrains (aaab) with ‘In clennes and in charite’ refrain and burden: ‘To criste singe we singe we singe we / In clennes and in charite’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Mankynde was shent and ay forlorffor synne that Adam did
                    before…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffro mortalle dethe mankyende to shildein clennes and in
                    charite

Zupitza,  Julius,

            1977: 53-4; 1977, 44-5.
